channel.title: Problem with server
channel.description:
[code]java.net.SocketException: Software caused connection abort: recv failed at java.net.SocketInputStream.socketRead0(Native Method) at java.net.SocketInputStream.read(Unknown Source) at java.net.SocketInputStream.read(Unknown Source) at client.packetProcess(client.java:14031) at client.process(client.java:14015) at PlayerHandler.process(PlayerHandler.java:137) at server.main(server.java:47) Icey PKz Server [fatal] - exception[/code]
Or
[code]java.lang.ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException: -101 at client.parseIncomingPackets(client.java:14946) at client.packetProcess(client.java:14045) at client.process(client.java:14015) at PlayerHandler.process(PlayerHandler.java:137) at server.main(server.java:47) Icey PKz Server [fatal] - exception[/code]
It comes up when few ppl are playing for moment
Might be of my Norton? if it is i delete it,i hate norton already :/
sooo if u know whats wrong ,post

uhh,ive been 2 years on this community,but i really think its my Norton antivirus´…
